GSP32vvmanmhu:9: yatkarma tat prayatnādhārajaṃ yathā - sampratipannaṃ karma,
GSP32vvmanmhu:21: etena vyāptidarśanakāle karmatvakāryatvāderaṅkaratajjananādau kevalasyāpi darśanād vyāptaniścaya iti parākṛtam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:27: 4) kiṃ ca vivādhyāsite pṛthivyudake prayatnavatā ghṛte,
GSP32vvmanmhu:34: tasyāpi sādhane bādhaḥ --- na hi draṣṭurddaṣṭerviparilopo vidyate (bṛha 4.3.23)
GSP32vvmanmhu:43: 7) bauddhaṃ prati īśvarasādhanam --- vivādādhyāsito vikalpaḥ tadatirikte pramā,
GSP32vvmanmhu:110: kalpanayā tatsiddhyabhyupagame vastuno 'sattvena tanmūlasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāsattvaprāptau viśvāsattvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:116: krameṇa kāryakaraṇārhaṃ sthiraṃ tadviparītaṃ kṣaṇikamiti vipratipatterviṣaya udghāṭanīyaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:157: nityatve sati gandhavān pārthivaḥ paramāṇuriti pārthivaparamāṇulakṣaṇam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:167: hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patireka āsīt (ṛ saṃ 10.121.1) iti śruteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:182: tañca pūrvānumānena sādhayituṃ śakyate iti na kaścid doṣaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:196: so 'gnerdevayonyā āhutibhyaḥ sambūya hiraṇyaśarīra ūrdhvaṃ svargalokametītyāgamabādhāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:218: mūrtatve sati tvagindriyānyatve ca sati vyāptyā tvagindriyasaṃyogādhāraḥ śarīram /
GSP32vvmanmhu:322: na ca sādhye bahuvacanakṣepaṇātiprasaṅga iti vācyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:324: na mano manasā saṃyujyate nityadravyatvāditi sādhane dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:328: tathā ca vyomaśivaḥ-- `parakīyena ca manasā sūkṣmaśarīrasthaṃ manaḥ maryāyeṇābhisambandhayati' /
GSP32vvmanmhu:331: na ca vimatipadaṃ viśeṣaguṇarahitadravyābhyāṃ na janyate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:341: tasya ca ko viṣaya iti cintāyāṃ paraśarīraparātmādiṣvatiprasaṅganirākaraṇārthaṃ yatra svayaṃ samavetaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:342: sa eva tasya viṣaya iti vaktavyamiti sthite ---
GSP32vvmanmhu:359: śarīrasya tu yogyānupalabdhyā bādha iti cet /
GSP32vvmanmhu:360: kiṃ cātaḥ? tasyaiva bodhādhāratvāttadabhāve bodhādhārasyāpi abhāva iti cet /
GSP32vvmanmhu:369: tatrāpi suṣuptaśarīrakriyādiṣu vyabhicāraparihārāya jāgrata iti viśeṣaṇaprāpte,
GSP32vvmanmhu:378: anye tu sarvārthavittiṣu grāhakatvena ātmasiddhiriti bruvate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:387: tathā hi --- asti tāvat saugatatacchiṣyāṇāmanātmavāsanāto viṣayebhyo nivṛtiḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:389: na ca te pramāṇamūle eveti niyamaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:393: na cājñānupūrvikā nivṛttiḥ pravṛttirvā svasthasya saṃbhavati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:404: kiṃ ca yogināṃ viyuktāvasthāyāṃ paramāṇurūpādiviṣayacākṣuṣajñānasya pakṣīkāre bhavatāmāśrayaikadeśāsiddhaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:406: na ca mānasapratyakṣatve tatsāmagrayāḥ sarvadā sannihitatvāt suṣuptāvasthāyāmapyātmajñānaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:407: ahaṃ śarīramitivivekāgrahaṇādiṣu ahaṃjñānotpattau bāhyendriyavyatiriktakārakagrāmasyaiva tvayāpi vaktavyatvāttadbalenaiva sarvasyopapatteḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:412: sa ca jñānāśrayo na tu vijñānātmakaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:424: na ca tatra tasya sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti vācyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:431: tathā hi -- ghaṭasaṃyuktena cakṣuṣā janitaṃ jñānaṃ ghaṭamevāvagāhate nārthāntaram,
GSP32vvmanmhu:446: so 'yaṃ piṇyākayācanārthaṃ gatasyāpi śākādinaḥ khārikātailadātṛtvābhyupagama iva /
GSP32vvmanmhu:481: na ca `prakṛṣṭaḥ prakāśaḥ savitā' itivat śabdadvayenāpi eka evārthaḥ pratipādyate iti yuktam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:486: kiṃ ca loke yathā prakṛṣṭaprakāśaśabdayoḥ parasparavyatirekeṇa prayogaḥ --- prakṛṣṭaḥ pumān,
GSP32vvmanmhu:493: mukhye bādhakasambhavāt --- 'aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chā u 8.12.1)
GSP32vvmanmhu:510: na hi siddhasya sampādanāya kaścid yatate 'tra /
GSP32vvmanmhu:520: tadanupapattiriti yo 'yaṃ doṣa uktaḥ, sa samānaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:522: na ca tathāvidhasya muktau kathāsambhava iti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:537: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte /
GSP32vvmanmhu:540: asyā arthaḥ -- dvau suparṇau ātmānau sayujau = sahavartamānau sakhāyau = ekakāryakāritvena,
GSP32vvmanmhu:541: samānaṃ vṛkṣam = ekaṃ śarīraṃ pariṣasvajāte = āliṅgitavantau /
GSP32vvmanmhu:542: tayorātmanormadhye eko = bhoktā pippalaṃ svādu atti = sukhaviśeṣaṃ bhuṅkte /
GSP32vvmanmhu:543: anaśnan anyaḥ = abhoktā īśvaraḥ abhicākaśīti = sarvato 'tyarthaṃ prakāśate iti vispaṣṭo jīvabrahmaṇorbhedaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:544: ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjamānāṃ sarūpāḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:553: na ca sati prayojane nimitte copacāraḥ pravartate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:614: etenāvibhu nityadravyatvādityanenāmahattvasādhane sādhyavyāpakatvāt sparśavattvaṃ nopādhiriti śrīvallabhoktaṃ nirastam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:650: nīlaṃ tama iti pratītiḥ pramāṇamiti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:652: uktaṃ ca śālikanāthenāpi-- apratītāvevāyaṃ pratītibhramo mandānām' (pra paṃ 321) iti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:660: kathaṃ tarhi chāyāyāṃ kṛṣṇasarpabhrama iti cet, doṣavaśāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:676: yathāhuḥ --- añjanapuñja iva śārvaraṃ tama iti bhrāntiprakaraṇe tatra pratibhāsikabādhānupapatteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:679: tamaḥ śabdasya tarhi ko 'rtha iti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:681: ālokaviśeṣe satyapi ālokāntarābhāvasyāpi sambhavāt prayogaprasaṅga iti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:683: asti cet, tamaḥśabdaprayogo 'pyastu, kā no hāniḥ?
GSP32vvmanmhu:685: atha yathā jvālāyā āśutaravināśitvena madhye vināśe vidyamāne 'pi tatsadṛśajvālotpattyā tirohitatvānna nāśavyavahāraḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:688: tattulyaṃ te tarkakarkaśamaterapyuktaparihāraścakṣurālokāsahakṛtaṃ rūpigrāhakaṃ dravyagrāhakendriyatvāttvagvaditi vādinaḥ kālagrāhakaghrāṇenānaikāntikaṃ vyarthaviśeṣaṇatā ca /
GSP32vvmanmhu:690: indriyatvāditi sādhane ghrāṇena prativādinānaikāntikatā vivakṣitā---sādhakatvaṃ ca /
GSP32vvmanmhu:691: na hi tava tathāvidhaṃ tama eveti lakṣaṇaṃ kālāderapi ālokanirapekṣendriyagrāhyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:692: 5) ālokabhāvasyobhayavādisampratipannatvāt tamaḥśabdavācyatve nāsti vipratipattirnātra prakaraṇaṃ vācyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:751: guṇatve sati cakṣuḥsparśanayormadhye cakṣuṣaiva grahaṇārhaṃ rūpam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:795: asti ca tāvadekaṃ dve trīṇi ityādivyavahāraḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:798: na cābheda ekatvaṃ bhedasamuccayaḥ punaranekatvamiti yuktam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:816: tathāpyananusaṃhitavaijātyādīnāṃ bālagopālādīnāṃ dvāviti vyavahāro 'yaṃ na tannibandhanaḥ dvyaṇukaparimāṇaṃ dvitvasaṃkhyayā vinā na ghaṭate
GSP32vvmanmhu:828: teṣāṃ jñānaprāgabhāvena vyabhicāraḥ --- guṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇe īśvarecchāyām,
GSP32vvmanmhu:845: 2) tathā vyavahāreṇāpi sādhanīyam --- asti tāvadayaṃ mahān,
GSP32vvmanmhu:890: asamavāyikāraṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇe kevalasaṃyogārambhakeṇa saṃyogena vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:892: na ca saṃyogavyatiriktāsamavāyikāraṇatvāditi saṃyogasyaivāsamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ pratīyate iti bādhitaviṣayatvam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:922: tadasat, ākāśadeśena vibhāgamārabhate karmatvādityapi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:926: uttarasaṃyogādvināśaḥ paścādapi kathaṃ vibhāgapratyayānuvṛtterapi na vācyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:964: 2) prabhākaramate vivādapadaṃ na mānasapratyakṣaṃ jñānatvāditi na sāmpratam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:967: na ca ghaṭaṃ jānāmītyatra kalpanālāghavādekameva jñānaṃ kalpanīyam --- ityarthāpattyupanyāso doṣaḥ syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:975: na ca jñānaṃ mānasapratyakṣaṃ na bhavati,
GSP32vvmanmhu:984: te tu praṣṭavyāḥ--- kimidaṃ rajatajñānaṃ nāma?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1002: yacca vimataṃ jñānaṃ yathārthaṃ jñānatvāditi bruvate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1008: bālakasya svātmani vivekāgrahaṇamātrātpravṛttiṃ paśyata uttamavṛddhavākyaprayogānantaraṃ pravarttamānamadhyamavṛddhapravṛtterapi tanmātrapūrvakatvakalpanāt
GSP32vvmanmhu:1027: tena cāsmaduktāvāntarabhedasyābhyupagatatvādbhāsarvajñena sahāsmākaṃ nāsti vipratipattiriti nātra prapañcyate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1044: ātmā jñātavya iti vākyaprasiddho yogajo dharmaḥ sarvadarśitvādiphalakaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1048: yadāha bhagavān svayameva-- `śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe yogabhraṣṭo 'bhijāyate' (gī 6.11) iti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1056: bhavati hi vahnimān parvata iti jñānamiti hi dūradeśasthasya kasyāpi matiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1057: tathāpi tena tasyānumititvaṃ kathamavagamyate iti mā vocaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1062: tatsiddhau cānena pramāṇenānvayavyatirekāparanāmnā pratyakṣasāmagrīpraviṣṭenānyena vā siddhiriti yatkiñcidetat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1069: yena vinā yayoḥ sahabhāvādarśanaṃ tatra yena yasya vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1082: vyatirekiṇi tu tadabhāvasya sādhanatvenopayoge tasya vyavacchedakatve nopayoga iti viśeṣaṇavaiyarthyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1097: siddhasādhyatāyāśca parihārārthamāśrayajñānasya ca prathamamākāṃkṣitatvāt prathamataḥ pratijñāvacanam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1100: kāraṇamātrasiddhau viśeṣe jijñāsāyāṃ satyāmākāṃkṣāparyālocanayā hetumātrasyaiva vacanam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1119: prativādinā hi sādhanajijñāsā kṛtā kiṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1127: sambhave vā vastuno dvyātmakatvaṃ ko nivārayet?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1152: yenānaupādhikatve samarthaṃ syādato viśiṣṭaṃ na dūṣaṇamiti cet /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1153: tanna, jalpavādayorhi parasādhanaṃ nivartya svapakṣe sādhanaṃ vācyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1170: na hi kālātyayāpadiṣṭānaikāntikatvaṃ nāma samuditamasti dūṣaṇam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1176: na caitadatiriktaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nāma yat sādhanīyamavaśiṣyate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1182: nanu jñānāvisaṃvāditvagrāhakapratyekṣaṇa tatpūrvakābādhitatatpravṛttibhyāṃ tajjñānaviṣayīkṛtārthasya yathārthasya kriyākāritvena bādhitaviṣayatvādanumānasyaiva durbalatvamiti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1215: nadyāstīre pañca phalāni santīti vākyādarthapratyayo jāyate iti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1216: atra kasya kāraṇatvamiti vibhāvyatām--- na pratyakṣasya,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1219: na hi nadyāstīre pañca phalāni santīti vākyena nadītīraphalasambandhasyāvyabhicaritaḥ sambandhaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1268: ata eva madanumāne ... {One line lost in the MS.} anyathā siddhasādhanatvādakāryatvaṃ copādhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1270: upamānaṃ tu madīyā gauranena sadṛśīti gosadṛśagavayamālokayato 'numānameva /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1282: ca sādṛśyasyopalakṣaṇatve nirṇīte tadeva vākyaṃ gavayapadasya gavayatvanimittatvaṃ bodhayati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1295: pramāṇadvayavirodho 'pi sāvakāśānavakāśayoḥ sāvakāśasya viṣayasaṃkoca iti vyāptidarśanavato
GSP32vvmanmhu:1299: vākyamantareṇa vākyānupapatterabhāvāt na hi pīno devadatto divā na bhuṃkte' iti vākyaṃ `rātrau bhuṃkte' iti vākyena vinānupapannam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1301: na hi pacatīti padaṃ pratyakṣādinā nirākāṃkṣamapi tu odanapadeneti cet, na,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1307: na ca so 'pyasti traikālikabhojananiṣedhe hi sa syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1339: satyapi duḥkhe tadvyavahāradarśanāt --- santāpavataḥ śītahrade nimagnārdhakāyasya sukhyahamiti mateḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1389: sa ca vegaḥ pratyakṣe dravye pratyakṣeṇaiva gṛhyate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1407: na ca vācyaṃ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ kṣaṇikasya yāgasya kālāntarabhāvini svarge vināvāntaravyāpāraṃ upapadyate iti madhye 'pūrvasiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1414: kāmādhikāreṣu phalaṃ prati kāraṇasyaiva satastasya niyogaṃ prati viṣayatvābhyupagamāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1417: (3 adharmaḥ--) yo brāhmaṇāyāvagurettaṃ śatena yātayāt' (tai saṃ 2.6.10.2)
GSP32vvmanmhu:1428: 2 śabdo dravyaṃ sākṣādindriyasambandhena gṛhyamāṇatvādghaṭavaditi cet, na,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1433: svapadasya grāhyapadasya na vyāvartanamasti adravyasya bhavatāṃ naye sambandhānabhyupagamāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1444: ātmavyatiriktatve sati indriyāṇāṃ madhye nityenaivādhyakṣīkṛtāyā jāteradhikaraṇatvātsukhavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1450: anitya śabdaḥ arasatve satyavayavyagrāhakeṇaiva gṛhyamāṇajāteradhikaraṇatvādgandhavaditi bhāṭṭaṃ prati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1452: ātmaviśeṣaguṇānyatve sati indriyāṇāṃ madhye nityenaiva gṛhyamāṇatvāditi,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1464: evaṃ vyavasthite pratyakṣeṇāpi sādhyate naṣṭaḥ śabda iti pratīteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1500: asmākaṃ tu vyāptikāle sattāpratipattau cānyatrāpi siddhiḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1506: samavāyikāraṇatvād ghaṭavat --- atra vipratipattiviṣayasyaiva tathāvidhatvānna sādhye viśeṣaṇopādānād dūṣaṇam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1583: gomayajavṛścikaśarīrasantānavadityanumānenābrāhmaṇapūrvake kvacid brāhmaṇaśabde prāpte na brāhmaṇajanyaśarīranibandhano brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1614: ato na sādhyavikalatā tatra saṃyogasamavāyamātre viprattipattirna dharmiṇi /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1628: āśrayakṛtaḥ svarūpakṛtaḥ kāryakṛto vā virodhaḥ syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1644: prathame na kadācidapi tayoḥ pratipattiḥ syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1656: na hi tasyāpratyakṣasya pūrvaṃ svabhāvo nirdhāritaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1668: yadi nāstīti pratyayavedyamāno 'pi tvayā neṣṭa iti vaktuṃ nocitam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1673: bhūtalamātravyavahārātiriktatve sati bhūtalavyavahāratvāditi mānaṃ bhūtalamiti vyavahāreṇānaikāntikam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1675: bhavati hi ghaṭatadrūpayoḥ sahopalambhe 'pi rūpaṃ ghaṭo na bhavatīti bhinnaścotpādavyavahāraḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1697: brīhīn prokṣatīti dvitīyāyāśca na tatsamavetasaṃskāravācakatvaṃ kriyājanyaphalabhāgitvaṃ ca na tatsamavāyinamākṣipati,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1699: anyathopayuktānāṃ prastarādīnāṃ homenotpādyamānaḥ saṃskāro na teṣāṃ syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1706: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyatra prābhākarāṇāṃ naye jñānajanitaphalasya ghaṭe kasyacidabhāvāt tatra kathaṃ karmatvamiti cintyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1716: jñātatānabhyupagamāt kathaṃ jñānasya viṣayaniyama iti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1733: astu tarhi sādṛśyaṃ padārthāntaramiti cet, na,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1747: na ca vivādapadaṃ sākṣātparamparayā vā prakṛtijanyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1757: na ca sati kāraṇavyāpāraḥ asārthakatvāditi jātiniyamajñena vyavasthā ghaṭate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1758: yenaiva pramāṇena ghaṭabhāvasiddhistenaiva pramāṇena yogyānupalabdhyā paṭotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ tantuṣvapi paṭābhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1764: kiṃ bahunā ``parasparavirodhe hi na prakārāntarasthitiḥ'' iti nyāyāt padārthāntarāṇāṃ na sambhavaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1767: tatra hi dravyādināṃ heyopādeyasvarūpeṇa jñāne sati saṃsārasya duḥkhabhūyastvaṃ paśyataḥ sukhamapi duḥkhānuṣaṅgādduḥkhapakṣe nikṣiptam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1768: upaniṣadā ca jñātajīvātmabrahmaṇo vaiśeṣikoktadṛśā bhagavadbhaktimanaskasya sadgurukaṭākṣapātakṣīṇāntarāyasya
GSP32vvmanmhu:1777: na hi siddhārthe kaścitprayatate iti bhavatāmapi avidyānivṛttireva kṛtisādhyā,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1780: ``ānandaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ tacca mokṣe 'bhivyajyate'' iti santoṣajasukhabhiprāyeṇa gauṇyā vṛttyā duḥkhābhāvābhiprāyeṇa vā kathaṃcidguṇavāda iti,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1781: ``aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ'' (chā u 8.12.1)
GSP32vvmanmhu:1786: atra kecit-- duḥkhaparihārārthaṃ jñānasukhayoḥ pūrvaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhāvo 'nupapannaḥ paścādutpādya iti brūyuḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1797: na ca jīvā nityajñānā ātmavadīśvaravaditi sāmpratam,
